sentences.en: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
sentences.cn: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

sentences.en: He began to learn Japanese three years ago.
He doesn't speak much Japanese but he can make himself understood.
sentences.cn: 他日语说得不太好,但尚能表达清楚自己的意思.

sentences.en: He is quite at home with the Japanese language.
Her familiarity with Japanese surprised me.
sentences.cn: 她对日语的熟谙使我惊奇.

sentences.en: Japanese differs greatly from French in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 日语发音和法语大不相同.

sentences.en: Japanese has borrowed heavily from English.
sentences.cn: 日语借用了很多英语词汇.

sentences.en: Many Chinese idioms have infiltrated into the Japanese language.
sentences.cn: 许多中国成语浸透到日语中.

sentences.en: Most of the students of our class take Japanese as an elective course.
sentences.cn: 我们班大部分同学选修日语.

sentences.en: New Japanese cars averaged 13 km to the litre in 1981.
sentences.cn: 1981年，新型的日产汽车平均每升汽油能跑13千米。

sentences.en: Not only did he speak English well, but he spoke Japanese more easily.
sentences.cn: 他岂但英语说得好, 就连日语也讲得满轻松自如.

sentences.en: She has a passable knowledge of Japanese.
The city was all burnt down during the the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression.
sentences.cn: 抗日战争期间,这座城市全部给烧毁了.

sentences.en: The Japanese women salute the people with formal bows in welcome.
sentences.cn: 这些日本妇女以正式的鞠躬向人们施礼以示欢迎。

sentences.en: The loch's overflow cascades into the waterfalls of a Japanese water garden.
sentences.cn: 溢出的湖水倾泻而下，形成了一座日式水景花园的瀑布。

sentences.en: There is a shortage of well qualified teachers of foreign languages, especially of French and Japanese.
sentences.cn: 合格的外语教师还很缺乏, 尤其是教法语和日语的.

sentences.en: This is a heroic company which fought on many fronts in the Anti - Japanese War .
sentences.cn: 这是一支 抗日战争 中经过南征北战的英雄连队.

phrases.tran_cn: 流行性乙型脑炎；日本乙型脑炎

trans.tran_cn: 日本的，日本人的，日语的
trans.tran_en: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
